path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Iosiro/Iosiro-1inch Network Fixed Rate Swap Smart Contract Audit November.pdf

findings.title: Token pairs must have the same number of decimals
findings.description: Require statements were added to the constructor to revert if the asset types provided had a different number of decimals, but a more flexible approach would be to implement logic that correctly scales between the assets based on their number of decimals at all entry and exits points in the contract.
